div.p: MU 94, box 4 (4122), Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa, Wellington.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
MS annotation: 'And' [Answered]. 10/12/79
Letter registered at the Geological Survey Office, Wellington, on 23 December 1879.

It will be best, dear Dr Hector, that I write to my Swedish friend, Dr Berggren, for an other copy of the "Minnesskrift",
The celebratory volume Fysiografiska Sällskapet (1878), which contained Berggren (1878), a paper on New Zealand plants. See also M to J. Buchanan, 11 November 1879 (in this edition as 79-11-11a). so that you can keep the one now transmitted.
